Description:
Sophistication, Space and Harmonious Living
In Room Auction Tues 19 Feb 2019 - Manningham City Council | Function Room 1, Civic Offices, 699 Doncaster Road, Doncaster - 6.30pm for 7pm Start.
Setting a new benchmark in design and harmonious living and displaying clean contemporary lines, complete security and a cutting edge street presence conveys the quality of the highly-regarded Willow Apartments at Williamsons Estate. This sophisticated apartment's third floor placement bathes in natural light and convenience. Conceived by noted architects RotheLoman and opposite the year round facilities at Aquarena Aquatic and Leisure Centre, the residence savours outlooks towards distant neighbourhoods. Framed by double glazed windows and accented by American Oak timber floors, the open-plan living/dining environment, connecting to a wide alfresco balcony, incorporates a stone benched kitchen with soft-close cabinets and Smeg stove top, oven and dishwasher. A clever extra servery area with abundant upper and lower cupboards is positioned nearby. An added bonus is a host of Smeg appliances including front loader washer/dryer, refrigerator, microwave, toaster, kettle, coffee machine, mixer, juicer and blender. The main bedroom provides a walk-in-robe and twin vanity ensuite and a second robed bedroom with balcony access is serviced by a designer bathroom. Features include European laundry, split-system, heating/cooling, video intercom, secure entry, basement car space and storage cage.
Step into a superior lifestyle in fabulous proximity to Westfield Doncaster, Ruffey Lake Park, St. Gregory the Great, Doncaster Primary and Doncaster Gardens Primary Schools, Doncaster and Templestowe Secondary Colleges, Macedon Square and Templestowe Village and with a bus stop conveniently at your door step.
